meanings.definition: To show excessive favoritism towards someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher overfavored the student by always giving them extra points.
meanings.sent2: She felt overfavored when her boss always let her leave work early.
meanings.sent3: The cat overfavored the new toy, ignoring all its old ones.
meanings.sent4: The politician overfavored one district, neglecting the needs of others.
meanings.sent5: The overfavored child always got the biggest slice of cake at parties.

meanings.definition: To be given preferential treatment or advantages.
meanings.sent1: He overfavored his best friend by always sharing his snacks with him.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family was overfavored in the selection process for the exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: The cat overfavored the sunny spot by the window, leaving the other pets in the shade.
meanings.sent4: The overfavored team had all the best players, making the game unfair.
meanings.sent5: Being overfavored can sometimes lead to others feeling jealous or resentful.
